Player History
Drafted in 18th round, 283rd overall pick, by New York in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/3/2015, off Tobias Ortiz (BRO)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/8/2015, off Lamont Pizano (CHI)...
Injured on 6/24/2015 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 7/17/2015 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...

Injured on 4/27/2017 with a Swollen Ear, out for one week...
